LanguageData.ERN_BigCarbuncle.label: grand carbuncle
LanguageData.ERN_BigCarbuncle.description: On worlds that carbuncle have colonized thoroughly, occasionally individuals will grow to a prodigious size, large enough to be ridden like horses. What causes this is as mysterious as the origin of the species itself, but should a colony find such a rare specimen it is considered an omen of great fortune - not just because of superstition of luck-granting powers, or the rarity of the creature itself, but also just because who wouldn't want to ride around on such an adorable creature?
LanguageData.ERN_BigCarbuncle.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.ERN_BigCarbuncle.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.ERN_BigCarbuncle.tools.3.label: head
